name: Jingmin Central Hotel

reviews.text: Best Western Premier is showing its age [I would guess 15 years at least]. The carpeting in the room is old, the furniture is plain and old, this is not a new first class room. Bathroom tiles and counters are from 15 year old ago era. If you look at back edges of carpeting, behind sofa and beds there is lots of built up dust. The room was not terrible, it is adequate, and I suppose in China you can get alot worse... but this was no 4 star hotel room. My local vendor who I had appointments even asked why I stay at Best Western, they put their guest up at Marco Polo, or Sheraton just opened 4 months ago. I cannot vouch for these, just repeating what locals told me.
reviews.title: Showing Its Age- Only 3 Star, Not 4 Star
Excellent Hotel
reviews.text: One plus to the Best Western is that they give you a bunch of meal coupons, apparently the room not only includes a huge breakfast spread, but also dinner with free beer. The dinner is also and expansive buffet.

Stayed at the Best Western in Xiamen as a result of the review on this website (Thanks to the previous poster). Excellent hotel. Stayed in a suite which has the bedroom (King bed) and a separate room which is a living area. Bed was soft, room clean, bathroom large, very quiet and everything as good as you would find in any five star hotel in the US or Australia (probably better).
reviews.title: A true gem of a hotel in one of China's most beautiful cities...

description: From the hotel's location it's easy to reach the municipal government, the shopping centers and famous scenic spots like Gulangyu Island. The distance from the hotel to Gaoqi International Airport and Xiamen International Conference & Exhibition Center is just 8km and 10km. It's equipped with standard rooms, deluxe apartments and executive floors. All 490 exquisite rooms and suites are well designed according to the requirements of guests worldwide. Various restaurants with Chinese, Western and Japanese style. An American bar, Japanese club and a lobby bar. For leisure, we have a squash room with international standards, an indoor swimming pool, health center and night club.The bank, business center and air- ticket service will bring you more convenience.
